Such external links are not investigated, monitored, or checked by us.\n

> The Newsforce app aims to bring the best news experience on smartphones.

> The content ranges from brief news headlines to in-depth detailed analysis of controversial hot topics.

> The news content is sourced from most trusted and popular broadcasting corporations like BBC News, Fox News, CNN, etc.

> Anything from politics to technology, our app covers all the domains.

> We also provide suggestions, based on your favourite topics and areas.

> Our app educates, informs and entertains.
